p: EOs of P. peuce twigs, P. peuce needles and P. mugo needles decreased cell viability of MCF-7 by at least 85%. EOs of P. heldreichii twigs, P. heldreichii needles and P. mugo twigs reduced metabolic activity of MCF-7 by 45–60%, while the EOs of P. mugo cones showed least cytotoxic effect to MCF-7 with only 15%. IC 50 values ranged from 0.06 for P. peuce (needles and twigs) oils to >0.1 for P. heldreichii (needles and twigs) and P. mugo (twigs and cones) oils. Essential oil of P. mugo needles showed the highest IC 50 with 0.3 ( Table 2).
